{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = So Barry Goldwater, do you know about Barry Goldwater?

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:46.399
    | text      = Barry Goldwater was a five-term senator from Arizona who was, to put it mildly, batshit

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:12:57.279
    | text      = So Barry was born the son of parents who owned a department store called Goldwater's, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:05.039

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:19.800

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:28.340

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:36.060

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:13:50.979

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
